titleStmt.title: A non est inventus return'd to Mr. Edward Bagshaw's Enquiry, and vainly boasted discovery of weakness in the grounds of the churches infallibility also his seditious invectives against the moderate sincerity of Protestants, and savage cruelty against Roman Catholicks repressed / by a Catholick gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674.

titleStmt.title: A non est inventus return'd to Mr. Edward Bagshaw's Enquiry, and vainly boasted discovery of weakness in the grounds of the churches infallibility also his seditious invectives against the moderate sincerity of Protestants, and savage cruelty against Roman Catholicks repressed / by a Catholick gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Cressy by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Errors in paging: p. 24 misnumbered 42; p. 106-107 misnumbered 107-106.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
